H0.text: Name the town in the vicinity of Versailles famous for its hard-paste porcelain.. Limoges

H1.text: Name the town in the vicinity of Versailles famous for its hard-paste porcelain.. Vincennes

H2.text: Name the town in the vicinity of Versailles famous for its hard-paste porcelain.. Saint-Cloud

H3.text: Name the town in the vicinity of Versailles famous for its hard-paste porcelain.. Sèvres

A4.text: The Manufacture nationale de Sèvres is a public establishment manufacturing ceramic in the tradition of the 18th century.

A5.text: Sèvres is known for its famous porcelain production at the Manufacture nationale de Sèvres.
